title: Sword
data:
**Swords** encompass many different kinds of [weapons](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") found within [Nethack](/wiki/Nethack "Nethack"). Click on any weapon name below to visit the relevant page. Swords can be made from [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron"), [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood") or [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver"), cost anything from 10 to 8000[zm](/wiki/Zm "Zm"), and weigh from 30 to 150 units.

***

*This is a [disambiguation](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Disambiguation "NetHackWiki:Disambiguation") page: a list of articles associated with the same title.*  
*If an [internal link](https://nethackwiki.com/wiki/Special:WhatLinksHere/Sword) led you here, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended page.*

In the following table, damage listed below is applied to all targets. Those swords with special properties, such as double damage against specific monsters, are listed as "use link" . See the appropriate page for further details.

Artifact swords are listed in **bold**, while swords that are not normally generated (but are available via a [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish")) are in *italics*.

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

| Weapon                                                                     | Vs Small | Vs Large    | Cost | Weight | Material | Appearance                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- | ---- | ------ | -------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword")                             | 1d6      | 1d8         | 10   | 30     | iron     | [![Short sword.png](/images/3/35/Short_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Short_sword.png)                            |
| [Dwarvish short sword](/wiki/Dwarvish_short_sword "Dwarvish short sword")  | 1d7      | 1d8         | 10   | 30     | iron     | [![Dwarvish short sword.png](/images/a/a4/Dwarvish_short_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Dwarvish_short_sword.png) |
| [Elven short sword](/wiki/Elven_short_sword "Elven short sword")           | 1d8      | 1d8         | 10   | 30     | wood     | [![Elven short sword.png](/images/5/57/Elven_short_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Elven_short_sword.png)          |
| [Orcish short sword](/wiki/Orcish_short_sword "Orcish short sword")        | 1d5      | 1d8         | 10   | 30     | iron     | [![Orcish short sword.png](/images/3/34/Orcish_short_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Orcish_short_sword.png)       |
| [Broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword")                                | 2d4      | 1d6+1       | 10   | 70     | iron     | [![Broadsword.png](/images/8/87/Broadsword.png)](/wiki/File:Broadsword.png)                               |
| [Elven broadsword](/wiki/Elven_broadsword "Elven broadsword")              | 1d6+1d4  | 1d6+1       | 10   | 70     | wood     | [![Elven broadsword.png](/images/7/78/Elven_broadsword.png)](/wiki/File:Elven_broadsword.png)             |
| *[Runesword](/wiki/Runesword "Runesword")*                                 | 2d4      | 1d6+1       | 300  | 40     | iron     | [![Runesword.png](/images/b/b6/Runesword.png)](/wiki/File:Runesword.png)                                  |
| **[Dragonbane](/wiki/Dragonbane "Dragonbane")**                            | use link | use link    | 500  | 70     | iron     | [![Broadsword.png](/images/8/87/Broadsword.png)](/wiki/File:Broadsword.png)                               |
| **[Orcrist](/wiki/Orcrist "Orcrist")**                                     | use link | use link    | 2000 | 70     | wood     | [![Elven broadsword.png](/images/7/78/Elven_broadsword.png)](/wiki/File:Elven_broadsword.png)             |
| **[Stormbringer](/wiki/Stormbringer "Stormbringer")**                      | use link | use link    | 8000 | 40     | iron     | [![Runesword.png](/images/b/b6/Runesword.png)](/wiki/File:Runesword.png)                                  |
| [Two handed sword](/wiki/Two_handed_sword "Two handed sword")              | 1d12     | 3d6         | 50   | 150    | iron     | [![Two-handed sword.png](/images/d/d2/Two-handed_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Two-handed_sword.png)             |
| *[Tsurugi](/wiki/Tsurugi "Tsurugi")*                                       | 1d16     | 1d8+2d6     | 500  | 60     | iron     | [![Tsurugi.png](/images/c/c1/Tsurugi.png)](/wiki/File:Tsurugi.png)                                        |
| **[Tsurugi of Muramasa](/wiki/Tsurugi_of_Muramasa "Tsurugi of Muramasa")** | 1d16+1d8 | 1d8+2d6+1d8 | 4500 | 60     | iron     | [![Tsurugi.png](/images/c/c1/Tsurugi.png)](/wiki/File:Tsurugi.png)                                        |
| [Long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword")                                | 1d8      | 1d12        | 15   | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| [Katana](/wiki/Katana "Katana")                                            | 1d10     | 1d12        | 80   | 40     | iron     | [![Katana.png](/images/e/e9/Katana.png)](/wiki/File:Katana.png)                                           |
| **[Demonbane](/wiki/Demonbane "Demonbane")**                               | use link | use link    | 2500 | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| **[Excalibur](/wiki/Excalibur "Excalibur")**                               | 1d8+1d10 | 1d12+1d10   | 4000 | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| **[Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand")**                            | use link | use link    | 3000 | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| **[Frost Brand](/wiki/Frost_Brand "Frost Brand")**                         | use link | use link    | 3000 | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| **[Giantslayer](/wiki/Giantslayer "Giantslayer")**                         | use link | use link    | 200  | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| **[Snickersnee](/wiki/Snickersnee "Snickersnee")**                         | 1d10+1d8 | 1d12+1d8    | 1200 | 40     | iron     | [![Katana.png](/images/e/e9/Katana.png)](/wiki/File:Katana.png)                                           |
| **[Sunsword](/wiki/Sunsword "Sunsword")**                                  | use link | use link    | 1500 | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |
| **[Vorpal Blade](/wiki/Vorpal_Blade "Vorpal Blade")**                      | 1d8+1    | 1d12+1      | 4000 | 40     | iron     | [![Long sword.png](/images/2/2d/Long_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Long_sword.png)                               |

html:
Sword

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Swords encompass many different kinds of weapons found within Nethack. Click on any weapon name below to visit the relevant page. Swords can be made from iron, wood or silver, cost anything from 10 to 8000zm, and weigh from 30 to 150 units.

This is a disambiguation page: a list of articles associated with the same title.
If an internal link led you here, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended page.

In the following table, damage listed below is applied to all targets. Those swords with special properties, such as double damage against specific monsters, are listed as "use link" . See the appropriate page for further details.

Artifact swords are listed in bold, while swords that are not normally generated (but are available via a wish) are in italics.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Weapon Vs Small Vs Large Cost Weight Material Appearance
Short sword 1d6 1d8 10 30 iron
Dwarvish short sword 1d7 1d8 10 30 iron
Elven short sword 1d8 1d8 10 30 wood
Orcish short sword 1d5 1d8 10 30 iron
Broadsword 2d4 1d6+1 10 70 iron
Elven broadsword 1d6+1d4 1d6+1 10 70 wood
Runesword 2d4 1d6+1 300 40 iron
Dragonbane use link use link 500 70 iron
Orcrist use link use link 2000 70 wood
Stormbringer use link use link 8000 40 iron
Two handed sword 1d12 3d6 50 150 iron
Tsurugi 1d16 1d8+2d6 500 60 iron
Tsurugi of Muramasa 1d16+1d8 1d8+2d6+1d8 4500 60 iron
Long sword 1d8 1d12 15 40 iron
Katana 1d10 1d12 80 40 iron
Demonbane use link use link 2500 40 iron
Excalibur 1d8+1d10 1d12+1d10 4000 40 iron
Fire Brand use link use link 3000 40 iron
Frost Brand use link use link 3000 40 iron
Giantslayer use link use link 200 40 iron
Snickersnee 1d10+1d8 1d12+1d8 1200 40 iron
Sunsword use link use link 1500 40 iron
Vorpal Blade 1d8+1 1d12+1 4000 40 iron
Scimitar 1d8 1d8 15 40 iron
Silver saber use link use link 75 40 silver
Grayswandir use link use link 8000 40 silver
Werebane use link use link 1500 40 silver

'''Swords''' encompass many different kinds of [[weapon]]s found within [[Nethack]]. Click on any weapon name below to visit the relevant page. Swords can be made from [[iron]], [[wood]] or [[silver]], cost anything from 10 to 8000[[zm]], and weigh from 30 to 150 units.
{{disambig}}

In the following table, damage listed below is applied to all targets. Those swords with special properties, such as double damage against specific monsters, are listed as "use link" . See the appropriate page for further details.

Artifact swords are listed in '''bold''', while swords that are not normally generated (but are available via a [[wish]]) are in ''italics''.
